title: BONUS: Behind the Scenes!
itunes:title: BONUS: Behind the Scenes!
itunes:subtitle: How does Pete and Gary's Military History get made? Join the two hosts as they lift the curtain on what goes into each week's episode. Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki For more great history...
description:
How does Pete and Gary's Military History get made? Join the two hosts as they lift the curtain on what goes into each week's episode.

Presenters: Peter Hart and Gary Bain Publisher: Mat McLachlan Producer: Jess Stebnicki

For more great history content, visit www.LivingHistoryTV.com, or subscribe to our YouTube channel at www.youtube.com/c/LivingHistoryTV

Peter Hart's Military History is a Living History production.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/pete-and-garys-military-history.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
